sections.heading: State Patrol; provide information to law enforcement agencies
sections.text: The Nebraska State Patrol shall provide the information collected pursuant to section 86-805 to all law enforcement agencies in this state on a quarterly basis or as soon as practicable if a change in such information has occurred.SourceL

86-806.Nebraska State Patrol; provide information to law enforcement agencies.

The Nebraska State Patrol shall provide the information collected pursuant to section 86-805 to all law enforcement agencies in this state on a quarterly basis or as soon as practicable if a change in such information has occurred.

SourceLaws 2010, LB735, ยง 6.
